body.name: HDZIYU 4K Webcam with Microphone and Tripod - USB Web Camera for PC and Laptop, 8MP Widescreen for Video Calling, Recording, Streaming and Conference
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 21 hrs 20 mins
features: 📷 【8MP ultra HD 4k webcam】: 4K HD Web camera, with Sony CMOS image sensor inside, you can get 4K video recording at 20fps (only contact with 4K LCD Screen/Monitor), 1080p video recording at 30fps(only contact with 1080P LCD Screen/Monitor).USB 2.0 webcam can widely work with PC, desktop computers，notebook, laptop and Android TV (with USB port).

📷 【Wide Angle Webcam & automatic low-light correction】: Fixed focus webcam with 75 degree field of view, no distortion, no crowd, great for multi-person chats, video conference.Webcam with automatic low-light correction, still supply a clear image even in a dim area, let you have a different experience. PC webcam with facial-enhancement technology optimizes the image automatically, which makes you always look best.

📷 【Webcam with dual microphone and a tripod】: Webcam with Privacy Shutter & Freeze screen button(free mini tripod), web camera with privacy cover, effectively protecting your privacy. Freeze screen button, you can stop video calling or video recording at any time. Pause and play button allows you to freeze the screen during a video call, another person can't see what you're doing, you can press the play button to restore the screen anytime. Easy to enjoy a safe web life.

📷 【Plug and play pc webcam】: This use webcam with use power cable, no additional driver required, you just need to plug the use camera into your device’s user port, then you can use video software such as face time for calling; you can take it easily anywhere; Perfect for video calling, recording, conferencing, online teaching, live streaming, social gaming, telecommuting, etc

📷 【Multi application & superior compatibility】: 4K 1080p HD webcam for Windows 7/8,Windows 10, Mac OS 10.6 or above, Android 5.0 or above, etc. Compatible with most video chatting and recording software, like twitter, Yahoo Video messenger，MSN Messenger, youtube, skype, facetime, facebook, xbox one, obs, mixer, zoom, hangouts, twitch, whatsapp.You can easily use it for online teaching, video call, network call, and many other fields.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.3 4.3 out of 5 stars 282 ratings 4.3 out of 5 stars

productInformation.name: Special Feature
productInformation.value: Privacy cover, mini tripod included, 8MP/ 4K Webcam, Automatic exposure, Distortionless

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: USB Plug and Play Just plug and play, Get up and running immediately without having to bother about installing any drivers. Simply connect HD webcam to your computer and video chat instantly with Skype, Windows Messenger or your favorite instant messaging application. Privacy Protection HDZIYU W8A webcam with privacy shutter covers your webcam when not in use, and prevents web hackers spying on you. Package Includes 1 x 4K Webcam1 x Webcam Cover1 x Mini Tripod1 x Manual1 x Box

Note: If you are unable to access Windows 10's preinstalled Skype with this 4K webcam, please go to the Skype official website to download the desktop version. Make sure that you plug the webcam directly into your computer, NOT a USB hub. USB hubs are often too underpowered to operate a webcam. If your webcam's microphone isn't working, you need to disable the built-in camera or microphone of your PC itself on device manager, then enable the webcam's microphone. For desktop, it is recommended that customers use the USB interface on the back of the computer, the stability will be better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2020
reviews.reviewText: The camera Angle is clear, the pixels are clear, consistent with the description, and the lens can be adjusted to the height, so it is very convenient.Installation methods are relatively simple, inexpensive and of good quality.The night is also shot clearly, the price is also affordable, the effect is very satisfactory, the microphone is ok, in the video intercom can hear quite clearly, the sound quality is ok oh

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars IAM VERY HAPPY WITH THIS PRODUCT
reviews.reviewText: GOOD BUY FOR THE MONEY, CLEAR PICTURES AND VIDEO

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my custom built home PC so I could do work meetings from home.Easy pug and play driver installation. Although Web Ex didn’t like it at first.Had to uninstall and then reinstall, but work fine afterwards.Clear picture and decent audio.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great webcam with great lighting and best auto focus
reviews.reviewText: I think this is the best webcam on the market.The lighting is so soft that it doesn't create a huge glare. Autofocus does not distract you. It can focus on my face. And the image quality is the best I have ever had, making me look very professional. I am very satisfied with the purchase.

reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Half a product.
reviews.reviewText: I can't get any sound. I got it to work for a little while then started making a loud noise. Then I had to disable the sound.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The picture quality is very good, the picture is clear, very easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Achieved satisfied there is no problem, when video intercom can hear very clearly no quality, camera use is very convenient and directly use USB connection of computer, the camera can be mounted on a computer screen, very stable, can also be on the desktop, camera Angle is large, the picture is clear, a product that is convenient I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Really poor quality image
reviews.reviewText: While the physical camera looks great and worked immediately upon plugging it in, the image quality is horrible. It's noisy and pixellated and there's a fish eye effect from less than a foot away. I wanted to record myself painting and it looks horrible. I can take better videos with my Galaxy S3 phone that's eight years old. There's no way this is 1080p. To give you an idea, the images of the camera were taken with my Note 5. The fuzzy, blurry image of my painting is a still from a video I recorded with this webcam. Needless to say, it's going right back to the store.

Plug & Play.Esperemos que dure un buen tiempo.- Tiene una tapa para el lente para privacidad/protección.- Viene con un tripié metálico muy sencillo.- El cable USB es lo suficientemente largo para acomodar la webcam, entre 50cm y 1m. alrededor de tu espacio de trabajo (dependiendo del tamaño de tu dispositivos, laptop, ordenador con monitor, pantalla de tv).En cuestión de la entrega con Prime tardó 5 días, aprox. hasta CDMX.Por los datos del tracking, el producto viene desde Portland, Oregon.𝗖𝗼𝗺𝗽𝗿𝗮𝗿𝗲́ 𝗼𝘁𝗿𝗮 𝗽𝗿𝗼́𝘅𝗶𝗺𝗮𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁𝗲 . reviews.reviewTitle: Video is Ok the mic is finnicky
reviews.reviewText: I got this webcam cause it seemed like a good quality webcam. The video quality is good but I find the mic often stops working and I have to unplug it from my computer and reconnect it. If anyone has any solutions to this I will change the rating to 5 stars.Update: They have sent a replacement camera that is working great.
Beau produit, bonne qualité d'image, son. Facilité d'installation, ajustement.

Fue fácil de instalar, se conecta solo como dice lo único es que en mi caso el zoom no lo reconoció como el principal entonces si lo tienes que configurar con su prueba de sonido, pero super bien y a buen precio
